How do you rate this information?
Contact Information 01228 817000 customerservices@ carlisle.gov.uk Carlisle City Council, Civic Centre, Carlisle, Cumbria, CA3 8QG This page has been tagged with the following keywords ( What's this? ) industrial , properties , estates , land , property , trading , manufacturing , premises , factories , business , office , buildings , commercial , commercial properties , units , vacant , register , sites , real estate , Kingstown You are here: Home Page » Business » Commercial Premises » Industrial Estates » Kingstown Industrial Estate Kingstown Industrial Estate
Kingstown is Carlisle's largest industrial estate, extending to over 170 acres and adjacent to Junction 44 of the M6. The estate is approximately two miles from the city centre and is well serviced by public transport.
It currently provides employment for over 2,000 people. Wide ranges of businesses are represented, including a large number of national and international companies. Carlisle City Council, freeholder of the estate, manages Kingstown.
